description: PM Modi reviews drought and water scarcity situation at high level meeting with Jharkhand CM Raghubar Das PM Modi urges Jharkhand State Govt to initiate mass movement for water conservation PM Modi
caption: nm-4.com
message:
Had extensive discussions with Jharkhand CM Raghubar Das & officials on ways to mitigate the drought in the state. 

Urged State Govt to initiate a mass movement for water conservation, rain water harvesting & ensuring maximum coverage for soil health cards. http://nm-4.com/pz4o
